code: @Test public void testServiceCall() throws Exception {     getMockEndpoint("mock:result").expectedMessageCount(1).     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Hello World").     assertMockEndpointsSatisfied(). }

@Override public void configure() throws Exception {     ServiceCallConfigurationDefinition config = new ServiceCallConfigurationDefinition().     config.kubernetesEnvServiceDiscovery().     // register configuration     context.setServiceCallConfiguration(config).     from("direct:start").serviceCall("cdi-camel-jetty").serviceCall("cdi-camel-jetty").to("mock:result"). }

@Override protected RoutesBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             ServiceCallConfigurationDefinition config = new ServiceCallConfigurationDefinition().             config.kubernetesEnvServiceDiscovery().             // register configuration             context.setServiceCallConfiguration(config).             from("direct:start").serviceCall("cdi-camel-jetty").serviceCall("cdi-camel-jetty").to("mock:result").         }     }. }
